patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.10.0
patchlogs.additions: Many, many months ago we showed our community something we nicknamed 'baby's first Sentinel'. This quirky looking Sentinel has arrived, and it serves a very clear purpose: provide new players with an introduction to the Companion System. New player experience is always on our mind as Developers. This new Sentinel joining your Arsenal has that exact new-player approach to it’s functionality and mechanics. Say hello to TAXON! Perhaps Taxon will not replace the Mastery Rank 23 player's beloved Carrier, but please keep in mind that it was created and geared towards new-players who are experiencing Warframe for the first time.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ammo Case still applying its buffs after Carrier has died.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within
patchlogs.changes:
It’s been a long time coming and a highly request change! If you hadn’t guessed it already, Carrier usage represents almost 80% of the total used Sentinels, and considering we have more than 5 unique choices this needed balancing. Today we're eager to introduce a community driven experiment within the Sentinel class. This is not the final book in this conversation, just the beginning.
We've also mentioned Kubrow/Kavat are not off the table. What we want to do is measure. We know where Carrier sits in usage compared to the rest of the options. We want a calculated release of a change that will deliver on giving Sentinels the function of Vacuum, and see how it affects the usage of content in that category. The results are something we'll be sharing as it should be very interesting to everyone invested in this particular topic. The shovel in the ground on this will apply to Sentinels first, but Pets aren't off the table.
We're starting with Sentinels to have this contained group of content analyzed. We will be keeping a close eye on how all of you feel about the new vacuum as well as looking at metrics to see how the distribution of sentinel usage changes across the community (right now 80% of you use Carrier)! We will share results along the way as a team, as soon as this Friday on Devstream #81!
Carrier’s precept has been automatically changed to Ammo Case

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.3
patchlogs.changes:
Fixed an issue where Chroma would deal no damage with Vex Armor active. While this may sound like a simple fix, if you're a Chroma user please read on!
Solving Vex Armor actually takes as back to Chroma's beginning. On original power creation, we used some less-than-ideal calculation methods to create Scorn and Fury's effects. If you are an avid Chroma user, you probably know the power maximizing this ability brings. At some point in Chroma's future we will need to revisit and use ideal methods for his Abilities; we will inform you well in advance when Chroma is under review. As you may or may not know, Oberon is currently under review at this time!

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream idle animation not playing the hunch over animation.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed (for real this time) Chroma’s Effigy appearing as a full Chroma instead of his pelt.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Effigy pelt displaying a full bodied Chroma.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.changes:
Updated the icons for the Chroma Drevni and Chroma Vojnik skins to include shots of the default Helmet (with the skin colours applied) to resolve confusion.
Chroma's Effigy damage increased for all elemental types in Conclave.
Chroma's Vex Armor duration increased in Conclave.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with the Spectre versions of Mesa and Chroma seen in their respective Quests not properly holstering their weapons.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Hotfix 19.12.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Equinox (and possibly Chroma) appearing to have a full grown Cyst when in reality it's not mature and ready for curing.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a hitch when casting Chroma’s Effigy if you don't have the default helmet equipped.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: For those players who did not receive the Chroma Blueprint after finishing The New Strange quest, you will now have one in your Inventory upon relogging into the game!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Chroma’s Effigy.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.8.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed certain enemies being accessible in the Simulacrum (Chroma, Infested Mesa, etc) and secret-Codex entries being visible for certain enemies.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.changes: The Credit Boost function for the Secura Lecta has changed. Before, you could get on average 11.6x Credits from kills. This chance has changed and now scales with Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 8, you'll get on average 2x Credits from kills. This increase continues with your Mastery Rank. At Mastery Rank 18 you'll get on average 4x Credits from kills (capped). No other changes were made regarding synergies (i.e Chroma's Effigy, etc)

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a progression stopping bug in The New Strange quest if the Chroma Chassis was received but never built before Specters of The Rail released.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.4 + 19.4.1
patchlogs.fixes: Chroma Vojnik Battle-Damaged Skin by Volkovyi

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Chroma’s Vex Armor

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma appearing to have 2 pelts when activating a Focus ability while Effigy is also active.

patchlogs.name: Recurring Dreams + Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Quest and key missions not giving rewards (I.e Chroma Signal Blueprint, etc.) *We're working on a script to fix players who have not received their items and are currently stuck. Our sincerest apologies.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an incorrect texture on the Chroma Drevni TennoGen skin when using Effigy as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/709861-chroma-drevni-skin-bug/

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error with Chroma’s Spectral Scream on Dedicated Servers.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove: U4.2
patchlogs.changes: Fixed the holster position of secondary weapons on Nekros & Chroma.

patchlogs.name: The Silver Grove
patchlogs.changes:
Chroma’s Spectral Scream status chance now 100% in Conclave
Updated Chroma’s tail cloth physics.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 2
patchlogs.fixes: Potential fix for a couple of progression stoppers related to the Chroma quest: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/668478-the-new-strange-quest-bugged-stuck-at-craft-systems-systems-already-crafted/

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Chroma Blueprint parts not referencing updated component terminology.

patchlogs.name: Update: Specters of the Rail
patchlogs.changes: Chroma
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed dual Secondary holsters clipping through Chroma when equipped with his Agile stance.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.13.2
patchlogs.fixes: Possible fix for Chroma’s Effigy being invisible and dealing no damage as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/653506-chroma-effigy-bugged/

patchlogs.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Chroma’s Effigy wings not showing up for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the TennoGen Kaiju Chroma helmet being unsymmetrical with certain weapons and stances.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.7.0
patchlogs.fixes:
•    Fixed Chroma’s Effigy not taking the proper helmet customization.
•    Fixed badge placements on Excalibur, Chroma, Mirage, Saryn and Atlas.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes:
Increased the damage and decreased the health of Chroma's Effigy in Conclave.
Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward not functioning when the Cold element is used.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.1: Operation Shadow Debt.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma's Vex Armor not properly functioning against high level Infested Nanite clouds.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.changes: Chroma

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.6 + 18.0.6.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Ivara’s Cloak Arrow causing permanent invisibility when used on Chroma’s Effigy.
Fixed improper player customizations appearing on Chroma’s Effigy when Chroma uses their Focus while Effigy is active.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Effigy not correctly targeting enemy players correctly in Conclave’s Annihilation game mode.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.changes: Removed the Radial Scream from Chroma's Effigy and reduced its channeling cost in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect pricing on the Drac Chroma Helmet.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.11.0 + 17.11.0.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Vex Armor giving players a 4.5x multiplier instead of a 3.5x multiplier as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/559296-chromas-vex-armor-scorn-bonus-now-additive-not-multiplicative/
Fixed Chroma’s Afterburn Augment leaving lingering damage if killed while in use. 17.11.0.1

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.10.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Vex Armor Ability actually reducing player armor rating.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.10.2 + 17.10.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a percentage error showing too many decimals in the HUD buff of Chroma’s Vex Armor as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/556099-chroma-vex-armor-too-many-decimals/

patchlogs.name: Update 17.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a crash that would occur when viewing Chroma in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.8.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Clients sometimes not showing the correct energy colors when using Chroma.
Fixed Chroma not showing the proper energy element while in the Arsenal or in game.
Fixed Chroma's elemental damage always being Heat regardless of colour.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma not using the correct energy element in Conclave.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error providing players with 0 energy drain when using Ember’s World on Fire or Chroma’s Effigy if they fell off the level into a pit, etc.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma and Equinox's Energy colour not properly affecting states in PvP matches.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.5: The Jordas Precept. + Hotfix 17.5.1
patchlogs.changes:
Chroma’s Spectral Scream now drains 3 Energy.
Chroma’s Elemental Ward’s Electric elemental discharge effect is now affected by range Mods instead of strength Mods.
Chroma’s Elemental Ward Poison holster and reload speed are now affected by duration Mods instead of strength Mods.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Fire Elemental Ward allowing multiple heals each time they enter the aura.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma not appearing in the final portion of the New Strange Quest.
Fixed an issue caused by Chroma’s Effigy scream.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an ‘Ability in Use’ error message that would appear when two Chromas with different element types use Elemental Ward near each other.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes:
Chroma's green energy perk now gives a buff to holster and reload speed instead of affecting Stamina.
Chroma’s Vex Armor duration increased in PvP.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Cernos’ holster position impaling Chroma when Chroma uses Effigy.
Fixed an issue with Chroma’s Elemental Ward causing Grineer Scorch to reflect the AoE slow + Damage aura when augmented as Ice.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.10.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed duplicate Syandanas appearing for Clients on Chroma’s Effigy as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/479993-chromas-effigy-causing-double-ormolu-kyroptera-syandana/

patchlogs.name: Update 16.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Warframe armor not properly showing on Chroma when Effigy is cast followed by a cloaking ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream preventing players from being able to use quick melee.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.5: Tubemen Of Regor
patchlogs.changes: Chroma’s Vex armour duration increased.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.4
patchlogs.fixes:
The Amaru Chroma Helmet and Ovis Mesa Helmet are now available in the marketplace!
Fixed Chroma’s Effigy moving when in electric water or similar environmental hazards.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.5
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed secondary weapons floating away from Chroma (for real this time).
Fixed kills from Chroma’s Effigy, Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead and the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort not counting towards player stats.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Rakta Ballistica not sitting on Chroma when holstered.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Nullifier Crewmen not nullifying Chroma’s Effigy or Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead summons.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.3: The New Protocols
patchlogs.fixes:
Made small adjustments to Chroma’s Effigy to be less intrusive.
Fixed issue where using Chroma in a Mastery Test would cause enemies to stop spawning.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed error that would prevent Chroma from using powers after deactivating Effigy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma playing idle animations when using Spectral Scream as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/428896-chroma-does-idle-animations-during-spectral-scream/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Chroma’s Effigy being hostile to players if spawned while Chroma is under the effects of the Radiation proc.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Vex Armor increasing for shield / health decreases caused by Elemental Ward ending as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/425092-permanent-fury-on-chroma/
Fixed Chroma’s pelt not functioning properly for Clients.
Fixed Chroma’s Effigy giving players a stacking credit boost.  One Effigy per Chroma.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.4
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream being affected by rift status.
Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward fire AoE being affected by rift status.
Fixed Chroma’s Noble animations displaying a strange hand positioning.
Fixed Chroma’s elemental Ward not properly removing ‘old’ buff when 2+ Chroma activate the ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.0.2
patchlogs.changes: ·         Chroma’s alt helmet will no longer appear in player inventories after completing The New Strange Quest.
patchlogs.fixes:
·         Fixed Chroma’s Spectral Scream not equipping a weapon once deactivated if the ability was used while holding a scanner.
·         Fixed Chroma’s Elemental Ward buff showing as 1% off in the HUD in some instances.

name: Ghoul Auger
description:
Known colloquially as the 'drill sergeant', the Augur is fast-grown into its enhancements. As with all Ghouls, no regard is given to the proper development of its higher functions.
Cantilevered leg augments propel the unit toward the fray at speed, while over- and under-mounted extendable drill carriages magnify both reach and penetrating power.

name: Ghoul Auger Alpha
description: Whether through aberrant cognition or sheer brutality one specimen always moves to the front of each pack. It is from this individual that the other units take their lead.

name: Ghoul Devourer
description:
Vay Hek's personal favorite, the Devourer is a maximal terror unit. Draped in shreds of the diapause bag that birthed it, this gap-mawed monstrosity barrels toward prey with furious intensity.
Wrist-mounted hooks are welded to elbow joints and hyperpowered by a myotechnological winch system for maximum impact-and-pull.

name: Ghoul Expired
description: The Expired are Ghouls who have succumbed to malnutrition or environmental poisoning during the early stages of development. Their backup nervous systems continue to drive them forward, however, making them ideal suicide troops.

name: Ghoul Rictus
description: So named for its terrifying leer, the Rictus (AKA 'the Sawman') lives to divide and conquer its foes - literally.

name: Ghoul Rictus Alpha
description: This specimen shows evidence of advanced cognitive abilities and greater, if rudimentary, situational analysis. Cold blooded and ruthless, it is easy to see how this specimen led its pack so ably.

description: A high value Ghoul target.

patchlogs.name: Warframe Update 22: Plains of Eidolon
patchlogs.additions: It's been almost two years since we released the first version of Focus. Focus comes as a system unlocked upon completion of 'The Second Dream'. After answering a series of questions from The Lotus, you (the Operator) chose a Focus school and began your journey through a series of Passives that you needed to unlock all the while earning the Focus points to do so. Then came The War Within, where your Operator became playable with a few abilities meant mainly to help you earn Kuva and participate in Quests.

patchlogs.changes:
Nidus’ Ravenous Maggots will still attack but no longer latch on other Infested Maggots or Kuva Jesters due to awkward animations.  
In an effort to address the issue of people not noticing the movement of The Kuva Fortress, we have made the loop completion time odd rather than a 24 hour cycle. Players who were logging in around the same daily time found that the Kuva Fortress would always be roughly in the same position, and was restricting the variety of Kuva Siphon missions available.

Fixed Host Migrations breaking Kuva Siphon gameplay.
Fixed the Kuva Fortress position not setting up correctly every other day.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Update 19.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Made numerous performance improvements in the Kuva Fortress tileset.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash not being able to Teleport to Shrapnel Mine, Kuva Fortress Turrets and the Grineer Blunt.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: 19.1.0 Ash Revisited
patchlogs.changes:
The Kuva Fortress is now eligible for Grineer Sortie mission locations. 
Made some changes to lower level load time in some cases in the Kuva Fortress.
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Clients being unable to progress through Assault missions on the Kuva Fortress. 
Fixed players getting stuck under elevators in the Kuva Fortress tileset. 
Fixed some effects not replicating for Clients in Kuva Fortress Assault missions.
Fixed issues of long load times in Kuva Fortress Assault missions.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.4
patchlogs.changes:
Tweaked the placement of Caches in Kuva Fortress Exterminate missions.
Tweaked many aspects of the Kuva Fortress Mobile Defense missions, including removing consoles from some more cramped intermediates and adjusting some layout for procedural generation.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 19.0.3
patchlogs.changes:
Polished aspects of Kuva Fortress Assault missions. Individual markers have been added to shootable targets during the 'destroy the targeting mechanism' phase, and added teleport action under the falling debris so players don't get stuck when it's destroyed.
Kuva Fortress Cache hunting has been moved to Fortress Exterminate missions as it makes more sense for the pacing of the mission demands.
Fixed a confusing minimap marker in the Kuva Fortress tileset.
Fixed 'You picked up a key' transmission on the Kuva Fortress Assault mission playing for all players rather than just the user picking up the key.
Fixed the Grineer Icon on the Kuva Scimitar skin floating.
Kuva Siphon spawning has been disabled in Invasions and Void Fissure missions.
Fixed Kuva Siphons becoming 'frozen' by several Warframe powers, allowing for infinite farming.
Fixed Kuva Siphon progress being wiped during a host migration. Currently host migration will restart the event, but we are looking for 'continue' solutions. 
Fixed Powers affecting Kuva Siphoning.

patchlogs.name: The War Within: Hotfix 19.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to purchase the Xiphos Kuva Skin.

patchlogs.name: Update 19: The War Within
patchlogs.additions:
Once you've progressed far enough in The War Within to discover The Kuva Fortress, a new region will appear on your Solar Chart!
With this set, we knew we wanted to provide an awe-inspiring entry into the world of the Grineer Queens and Kuva. This set is complete with the latest in graphics enhancements like Volumetric Lighting, and includes some of the first ever Archwing Enemy incorporation into foot missions. Don't forget to aim up, Tenno.
After you complete The War Within, Kuva Siphons may appear on Hard Grineer Environments (Sedna, Kuva Fortress, Uranus). These are side-quests related to the larger goals of the Grineer Empire. You will encounter new enemies here, and be required to use the skills learned in The War Within to prevail.
patchlogs.changes: This chapter tells a story of your patience, our gratitude, and of course some wonderful evolution for the game. We're introducing an awe inspiring and dangerous environment: the Kuva Fortress. We're pushing our engine technology to bring you graphic improvements. We're bringing you a story about your past.

patchlogs.name: The Jovian Concord: Hotfix 25.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pax Seeker bolts appearing default Energy colour for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.2 + 24.1.2.1
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Pax Seeker activating on Warframe Exalted Ability Weapons (i.e. Titania Razorwing, Mesa Regulators).
Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles and Phantasma’s Alt Fire ignoring Nullifier bubbles.

patchlogs.name: Fortuna: Hotfix 24.1.1 + 24.1.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Pax Seeker projectiles not showing up for Clients.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.4.0
patchlogs.changes: To fix Tusk Seeker Drones lingering indefinitely and continuously calling in Grineer Reinforcements (even after you’ve ran far away), the Alarm Drone now destroys itself when you are 100 meters away.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.13.0: TennoGen, Passives, & Reworks
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed the Seeker pistol Mod displaying the wrong value as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/650694-seeker-states-35-punch-through/

patchlogs.name: Update 15.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Saryn’s Molt now removes Brood Mother Maggots, Nanite Swarms, Seeker Latchers and Leeches.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.8
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issue with Gammacor caused by using the Barrel Diffusion, Lethal Torrent and Seeker Mods all at once.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Bastille not affecting Grineer Seekers and Snipers, fixed damage not registering against Crewman affected by Bastille

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Seeker and Seeking Force mods so that their puncture amount increases with each level, instead of every other level.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.11.0: Vauban!
patchlogs.fixes: Seekers now have limit to number of active Latchers they can deploy.

patchlogs.name: Update 7.7.3: Level Expansions And New Weapons!
patchlogs.fixes: New Grineer helmets for Trooper, Seeker and Commander
